title: Anyone know Early sale date for dawnbringer/yasuo skin?
body: Got to mark that on calander I didn't get on release but will 100% pick them up when they hit their early sale.

replies.body: I don't quite yet have the data for when those skins will be a part of an early sale, but be sure to check our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to be the first to know when that early sale happens!
[Early sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts) are usually 4-6 months after the release of the skin.
Alright awesome thanks so there's no exact schedule for early sale then?

> [{quoted}](name=Tazz57,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=07mcyEg7,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-03T03:47:13.739+0000)
>
> Alright awesome thanks so there's no exact schedule for early sale then?

They post what goes on early sale for each month in advance like this one for [July ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule-1)but not with the exact dates, when the sales date goes up they put out the details in another post like [this](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-early-sales-72817-73117).  The early skin sales seem to usually show up somewhere in the last weeks of each month.
